import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import thumbnail from '../../assets/placeholder.jpg'; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; function ChannelAbout(){ const { channelId } = useParams(); return ( <> {`${userInfo.channeluser} - YouTube`}

{userInfo.description}

Joined {userInfo.joined}
{totalview} views
) } export default ChannelAbout;
